General.Name: HyosungONBCo.Ltd
General.Description: HyosungONBCo.,Ltd produces and supplies organic fertilizers in South Korea and internationally. It also provides grade 1 feed composts, crop exclusive fertilizers, microbial fertilizers, trace element fertilizers, liquid nutrients, and peatmoss. The company was formerly known as HYOSUNG O&B Corporation and changed its name to HyosungONBCo., Ltd in July 2006. HyosungONBCo., Ltd was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Daejeon, South Korea.
